channel.title: How to make npcs spawn when you click an object [PI]
channel.description:
As stated in the title, how would I go about doing this? When I click an object make specific npcs spawn.
Base: Project insanity

item.title: How to make npcs spawn when you click an object [PI]
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:2, topic:414189”][code=java]
public void objectClick(int id) {
switch(id) {
case id:
Server.getNpcHandler().spawnNpc(Player.xPosition, Player.yPosition, Player.height);
break;
}

}

[/code]

This won’t work for you.
It’s just a example.[/quote]

Appreciate it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npcs spawn when you click an object [PI]

item.title: How to make npcs spawn when you click an object [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

	public void objectClick(int id) {
		switch(id) {
			case id:
				Server.getNpcHandler().spawnNpc(Player.xPosition, Player.yPosition, Player.height);
			break;
		}
	
	}

This won’t work for you.
It’s just a example.

Read full topic
